trans-unit.source: Applies To: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0
trans-unit.target: Aplica-se a: Windows PowerShell 4.0, Windows PowerShell 5.0

trans-unit.source: The __Log__ resource in Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) provides a mechanism to write messages to the Microsoft-Windows-Desired State Configuration/Analytic event log.
trans-unit.target: O recurso __Log__ na Configuração de Estado Desejado (DSC) do Windows PowerShell fornece um mecanismo para escrever mensagens no log de eventos Microsoft-Windows-Desired State Configuration/Analytic.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the message you want to write to the Microsoft-Windows-Desired State Configuration/Analytic event log.
trans-unit.target: Indica a mensagem que você deseja escreve no log de eventos Microsoft-Windows-Desired State Configuration/Analytic.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the configuration of another resource must run before this log message gets written.
trans-unit.target: Indica que a configuração de outro recurso deve ser executada antes de a mensagem do log ser escrita.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the ID of the resource configuration script block that you want to run first is __ResourceName__ and its type is __ResourceType__, the syntax for using this property is `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a ID do bloco de script de configuração do recurso que você deseja executar primeiro for __ResourceName__ e seu tipo for __ResourceType__, a sintaxe para usar essa propriedade será `DependsOn = "[ResourceType]ResourceName"`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to include a message in the Microsoft-Windows-Desired State Configuration/Analytic event log.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como incluir uma mensagem no log de eventos Microsoft-Windows-Desired State Configuration/Analytic.

trans-unit.source: **Note**: if you run [Test-DscConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn407382.aspx) with this resource configured, it will always return **$false**.
trans-unit.target: **Observação**: se você executar [Test-DscConfiguration](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dn407382.aspx) com esse recurso configurado, ele sempre gerará **$false**.
